QuestData.Title: Choose Your Fighter
QuestData.Description:
The presence of the Jailer's forces at Provis Strata have been causing untold damage to the region. If left unchecked, we will lose all knowledge in the area.
One of our kin has prepared some automa to deal with the Mawsworn. Meet with them, and fight back against those who would disrespect Zereth Mortis in this manner.
QuestData.LogDescription: Pick an automa construct and use it against the Mawsworn.

Objectives.Objective: Custodian Taj spoken to at Provis Strata
